title: New incident reported at Block C
description: Minor electrical issue resolved. All systems are now operational and safe for use.

title: New incident reported at Block B
description: Suspicious activity reported in parking area. Security personnel have been dispatched. Please avoid the area until further notice.

title: New incident reported at Gym
description: Equipment maintenance completed. Gym is now fully operational with all safety checks passed.

title: Power outage near Engineering Block
description: Partial power outage affecting some classrooms. Backup generators are active. Classes in affected areas have been relocated.

title: Fire drill at Library 3PM
description: Scheduled fire drill completed successfully. All evacuation procedures were followed correctly. Library is now open for normal operations.
